com.flir.thermalsdk.meterlink

Interface OnMeterlinkTransferEventListener


  • public interface OnMeterlinkTransferEventListener
    The interface, which should be implemented by any class, that wants to receive notifications about Meterlink connection and data transfer events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBleTransferInProgress(MeterlinkBleTransferType type)
      Triggered when BLE transfer is in progress (Meterlink 3.0 only).
      void onConnectionError(MeterlinkException e)
      Triggered when some connection or transfer exception happens.
      void onDataReceived(SensorPoll sensorPoll)
      Triggered when data from a Meterlink is received.
      void onJpegImageReceived(byte[] imageData)
      Triggered when JPEG image from a Meterlink 3.0 is received.
      void onLogReadingReceived(DataReading logData)
      Triggered when log data from a Meterlink is received.
      void onMeterlinkConnected(AbstractMeterlinkDevice device)
      Triggered when Meterlink is connected.
      void onMeterlinkDisconnected(AbstractMeterlinkDevice device)
      Triggered when Meterlink is disconnected.
      void onProgress(MeterFileType fileType, int current, int total)
      File transfer progress callback function.

    • Method Detail

      • onDataReceived

        void onDataReceived(SensorPoll sensorPoll)
        Triggered when data from a Meterlink is received.
        Parameters:
        sensorPoll - sensor data object

      • onMeterlinkConnected

        void onMeterlinkConnected(AbstractMeterlinkDevice device)
        Triggered when Meterlink is connected.
        Parameters:
        device - a connected Meterlink device

      • onMeterlinkDisconnected

        void onMeterlinkDisconnected(AbstractMeterlinkDevice device)
        Triggered when Meterlink is disconnected.
        Parameters:
        device - a disconnected Meterlink device

      • onConnectionError

        void onConnectionError(MeterlinkException e)
        Triggered when some connection or transfer exception happens.
        Parameters:
        e - exception defining the error.

      • onLogReadingReceived

        void onLogReadingReceived(DataReading logData)
        Triggered when log data from a Meterlink is received.
        Parameters:
        logData - log data object

      • onJpegImageReceived

        void onJpegImageReceived(byte[] imageData)
        Triggered when JPEG image from a Meterlink 3.0 is received.
        Parameters:
        imageData - a JPEG image as a byte array

      • onBleTransferInProgress

        void onBleTransferInProgress(MeterlinkBleTransferType type)
        Triggered when BLE transfer is in progress (Meterlink 3.0 only). This is triggered once to determine what type of data is Meterlink sending right now.
        Parameters:
        type - type of BLE transfer

      • onProgress

        void onProgress(MeterFileType fileType,
                int current,
                int total)
        File transfer progress callback function. Transfer unit type is unspecified and may be any of bytes, packets, newlines etc.
        Parameters:
        fileType - file type being downloaded
        current - number of units downloaded of current file
        total - file size in number of units of current file
